short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds convenient functionality to users working with Freshservice automations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* When creating automations for workflows in Freshservice, it can be annoying to keep adding "/edit" to the URL every time you want to alter or create an automation. This app does that for you.

* Additionally, this app makes it easier to create web requests by increasing the size of the input field for the payload body when doing PUT, PATCH or POST requests.

* Increases the size of the email body field.

With this convenient app, you can forget about worrying and just focus on creating awesome automations in your domain after installing it.
